current.message: Older builds of FTB Omnia include builds of MineTogether that crash if you disagree to CreeperHost's Privacy Policy.

1-0-0.message: This build of FTB Omnia contains a build of MineTogether that crashes if you disagree to CreeperHost's Privacy Policy. DO NOT DOWNLOAD/INSTALL if you don't wish to accept this. Please consider installing a newer version.
